mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND CATEGORY = 'Q'

SELECT BOARD_NO, TITLE, NICKNAME, TO_CHAR(B.CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')"CREATE_DATE", COUNT, LIKED FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON(USER_NO = BOARD_WRITER) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND CATEGORY = 'Q' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT BOARD_NO, TITLE, NICKNAME, CONTENT, TO_CHAR(B.CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')"CREATE_DATE" FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON(USER_NO = BOARD_WRITER) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND CATEGORY = 'Q' AND B.STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM BOARD_ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_BNO = #{boardNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
